page.title: 20Washington's Law and Order.
page.content: The various villages are served by Community Policemen who patrol the area.One replied to a questionnaire. {1.How often do you come round? I come twice a day. {2.Do you only patrol Ayton? No,I go to Lambton and Wear Industrial Estates. {3.What kind of transport have you got? I have a Panda car and a bike. {4.Why do you use a bike? I get to know people better. {5.How long have you been a policeman? I have been in the force 13 years. {6.How many hours do you work? I work eight hour shifts. {7.Have you ever had to deal with glue { sniffing in Ayton? } Yes,glue sniffing is a problem. {8.How can we help to prevent crime? Make sure that all your things are safe.
